name: Iron Man
des: When an industrialist is captured, he constructs a high-tech armoured suit to escape. Once he manages to escape, he decides to use his suit to fight against evil forces and save the world.

name: Iron Man 2
des: Tony Stark is under pressure from various sources, including the government, to share his technology with the world. He must find a way to fight them while also tackling his other enemies.

name: Iron Man 3
des: Tony Stark encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. After failing to defeat his enemy, he embarks on a journey with relentless consequences and a suit that ceases to exist.

name: Avengers Endgame
des: After the devastating events of the Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanosâ€™ actions and restore balance to the universe.
